topic.title: Web Server Prerequisites
topic.shortdesc: Characteristics of the web server needed to run GLPI.

body.p: GLPI requires a web server supports PHP, such as :
GLPI requires PHP version 5 or above (http://www.php.net).

section.title: Required PHP extensions
section.p: The following PHP extensions are necessary for the proper functioning of the application :

ul.li: JSON : format support JSON structured data
Mbstring : chain management of multi-byte character

section.title: PHP extensions optional but recommended
section.p: The following extensions are required for optional features of the application :

ul.li: CLI : Using PHP from the command line for automatic actions
IMAP : mail servers use to collect the tickets or user authentication
LDAP : use of an external directory for authentication
